channel.title: Some good games to get into
channel.description:
I'm just looking for some decent games to get into that are fun. Any kind but not anything that deals with space.
And preferably under $50?
[RTS would be great ;)]

item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Warcraft 3 is the most dull rts yet. It had a nice single player campaign, but the multiplayer is plain awful and boring as shit (no don’t mention a bunch of mods because they are NOT the real game and often not even RTS’s).

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Dumke[AtomicFury”]link=topic=408087.msg3021734#msg3021734 date=1257635743]

Dont buy pc games its a dead shit industry.

I’d suggest downloading all Bioware-games (Role-Playing) as they are orssim: Baldur’s Gate 1 & 2, Icewind Dale 1 & 2, Neverwinter Nights 1 & 2 and the upcoming Dragon Age : Origins

Get Orangebox , it’s gotta be the best pc game out.[/quote]Incredibly boring and short-lived but k

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:14, topic:311644”][quote author=Frell link=topic=408087.msg3020424#msg3020424 date=1257549566]
Oblivion sucks, get Fallout.
[/quote]
Sorry but Oblivion > Failout any day.[/quote]
How so? I played oblivion over the summer because it was the only game i had with me and i missed fallout all the way through it. It was horrible and insanely boring. The only thing i liked was the bows and traveling through the forests.

item.title: Some good games to get into
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Try dungeon keeper 1 and 2, 1 is better but they are both decent rts games.

You’re evil, have to dig out your dungeon and attract creatures, torture and convert enemies, raise vampires etc.

Also try curse of monkey island, it’s a hilarious point and click pirate adventure game.

Deus ex 1 is an fps rpg like fallout, but good.

All 3 are some of the best of their genre.

Read full topic
item.source: Some good games to get into
